  "description": "Sweet Country Limited is a prime company focused on dynamic, innovative and cutting-edge solutions to the needs of our clients. We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Female Customer Service Officer / Social Media Marketer
Job Location:&nbsp;Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Are you a young dynamic, attractive, self-motivated, ambitious young ladylooking for immediate employment?
	Do you have the requisite skills in Online/Social Media marketing (Facebook, Google, Instagram etc)
	Do you have great communication skills, an amiable personality, and the drive to excel?
	In addition to your attractive salary, do you want to make commissions and mouth-watering bonuses?
	Do you want to make real money in the current Real Estate massive boom in Ibeju-Lekki axis of Lagos?
	Are you willing to get mouth-watering rewardsin cash, commission, amazing gifts like generator, refridgerator, Flat Screen/LED TV, Washing Machine, Oven/Gas Cooker, etc and travel for all-expenses paid trips while offering your best?
	Do you want to forge a formidable career in a corporate world like ours? If Yes, You are welcome.
	The female marketers cum customer service officers will enjoy an exciting, challenging and highly rewarding job experience by driving increased marketing and sales operations, creating social media campaigns, and recruiting independent marketers/consultants and training them in strategic operations
	The female marketers cum customer service officers will also present the company&rsquo;s estates to prospective clients while enjoying an attractive salary, unlimited bonuses and other mind-blowing incentives.
	Successful applicants will be trained specially and will enjoy amazing commissions on all sales in addition to their basic salaries. For instance, a dynamic customer service office/digital marketercould easily earn N350,000 and much more in a month beside their salary.


Responsibilities


	Create online/social media/digital marketing campaigns in driving real estate sales
	Recruit and train independent marketers/consultants/business partners who in turn will market our properties and services
	Prepare sales letters, proposals, PowerPoint slides, memos and other creative campaigns geared towards driving sales optimally.
	Create sharp, compelling and innovative online and offline campaigns by way of advertising company&rsquo;s products and services on online platforms
	Handle clients complaints and issues and grant speedy resolutions
	Constantly seek innovative actions that will drive up sales phenomenally.
	Prospect for clients; market the company&#39;s estate lands to potential clients.
	Invite and ensure attendance of new or propespective consultants to our weekly trainings


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree
	Should have 1 year of experience in marketing needed although we will train you adequately.


Key Attributes:


	Should be a respectful and positive-minded individual with a pleasing personality.
	Should be very competent in handling computer operations: Word, Excel, Powerpoint
	Should be well oriented in Computing &amp; Information Technology viz-a-viz online marketing, online advertising campaign, email marking, marketing on social media e.g Facebook, Twitter, and other popular online platforms
	Should understand Real Estate marketing operations and be quite familiar with land sales and documentation. S/he should also have understanding in logistics and transportation
	Should be a go-getter; should enjoy working with people and introducing company products/services to prospective clients
	Should be young, enthusiastic and aggressive with enhanced marketing and sales skills.
	Should be very articulate with impressive writing skills and excellent communication skills. A good command of English and good diction are prerequisites. S/he should possess excellent interpersonal skills and be a great motivator.
	Should have respectable presentation skills with the ability to convince and motivate clients and new marketers
	Should possess time management skills and be result-oriented.


Remuneration


	Basic Allowance / Salary: N80,000 Monthly
	Commission: 10% on all sales. A dynamic executive could easily make up to N350,000 monthly and even more with few sales
	Bonus / Other Incentives: Quarterly / Yearly Performance bonus.
	Gift items and paid vacations within and outside Nigeria.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send a well-written Application Letter, CV and a full-size photograph to:&nbsp;sweetcountryng@gmail.com&nbsp;using &quot;Application For the Position of Customer Service Officer / Social Media Marketer&quot; as the subject of the email.

Note


	Applications without well-written cover letter and full-size phoptograph and resume will not be considered.
	Only applicants residing around the Lekki/Ajah/Ibeju-Lekki axis or who can get accommodation in the area are advised to apply. Interview holds next week.

        Sweet Country Limited is a prime company focused on dynamic, innovative and cutting-edge solutions to the needs of our clients. Our business concerns cut across Real Estate-Sales, Marketing, Construction & Development; Supply of Building Materials; Consultancy-Project/Event Management, Training & Development; Logistics & Transportation; and General Trading Investment & Contracts.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Female Customer Service Officer / Social Media Marketer
Job Location: Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Are you a young dynamic, attractive, self-motivated, ambitious young ladylooking for immediate employment?
	Do you have the requisite skills in Online/Social Media marketing (Facebook, Google, Instagram etc)
	Do you have great communication skills, an amiable personality, and the drive to excel?
	In addition to your attractive salary, do you want to make commissions and mouth-watering bonuses?
	Do you want to make real money in the current Real Estate massive boom in Ibeju-Lekki axis of Lagos?
	Are you willing to get mouth-watering rewardsin cash, commission, amazing gifts like generator, refridgerator, Flat Screen/LED TV, Washing Machine, Oven/Gas Cooker, etc and travel for all-expenses paid trips while offering your best?
	Do you want to forge a formidable career in a corporate world like ours? If Yes, You are welcome.
	The female marketers cum customer service officers will enjoy an exciting, challenging and highly rewarding job experience by driving increased marketing and sales operations, creating social media campaigns, and recruiting independent marketers/consultants and training them in strategic operations
	The female marketers cum customer service officers will also present the company’s estates to prospective clients while enjoying an attractive salary, unlimited bonuses and other mind-blowing incentives.
	Successful applicants will be trained specially and will enjoy amazing commissions on all sales in addition to their basic salaries. For instance, a dynamic customer service office/digital marketercould easily earn N350,000 and much more in a month beside their salary.


Responsibilities


	Create online/social media/digital marketing campaigns in driving real estate sales
	Recruit and train independent marketers/consultants/business partners who in turn will market our properties and services
	Prepare sales letters, proposals, PowerPoint slides, memos and other creative campaigns geared towards driving sales optimally.
	Create sharp, compelling and innovative online and offline campaigns by way of advertising company’s products and services on online platforms
	Handle clients complaints and issues and grant speedy resolutions
	Constantly seek innovative actions that will drive up sales phenomenally.
	Prospect for clients; market the company's estate lands to potential clients.
	Invite and ensure attendance of new or propespective consultants to our weekly trainings


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree
	Should have 1 year of experience in marketing needed although we will train you adequately.


Key Attributes:


	Should be a respectful and positive-minded individual with a pleasing personality.
	Should be very competent in handling computer operations: Word, Excel, Powerpoint
	Should be well oriented in Computing & Information Technology viz-a-viz online marketing, online advertising campaign, email marking, marketing on social media e.g Facebook, Twitter, and other popular online platforms
	Should understand Real Estate marketing operations and be quite familiar with land sales and documentation. S/he should also have understanding in logistics and transportation
	Should be a go-getter; should enjoy working with people and introducing company products/services to prospective clients
	Should be young, enthusiastic and aggressive with enhanced marketing and sales skills.
	Should be very articulate with impressive writing skills and excellent communication skills. A good command of English and good diction are prerequisites. S/he should possess excellent interpersonal skills and be a great motivator.
	Should have respectable presentation skills with the ability to convince and motivate clients and new marketers
	Should possess time management skills and be result-oriented.


Remuneration


	Basic Allowance / Salary: N80,000 Monthly
	Commission: 10% on all sales. A dynamic executive could easily make up to N350,000 monthly and even more with few sales
	Bonus / Other Incentives: Quarterly / Yearly Performance bonus.
	Gift items and paid vacations within and outside Nigeria.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send a well-written Application Letter, CV and a full-size photograph to: sweetcountryng@gmail.com using "Application For the Position of Customer Service Officer / Social Media Marketer" as the subject of the email.

Note


	Applications without well-written cover letter and full-size phoptograph and resume will not be considered.
	Only applicants residing around the Lekki/Ajah/Ibeju-Lekki axis or who can get accommodation in the area are advised to apply. Interview holds next week.

Supply Chain Officer Job at LifeBank




        
    

        
        LifeBank is a technology company that powers hospitals and care centers to deliver quality healthcare to patients in emerging markets. The company’s technology, infrastructure, agile production, and distribution networks enable hospitals in emerging markets to catch up with their global peers. The company has distributed 45,000+ medical products to 1000+ healthcare facilities, saving 18,000+ lives across Nigeria, Ethiopia and Kenya. At LifeBank, we are the technology-led healthcare system for the future.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Supply Chain Officer

Job Location: Kaduna

Job Overview
     

            
    




	The Supply Chain / Fleet Officer will oversee logistics and fleet operations in Kaduna State. The officer will coordinate the distribution and movement of goods, ensure healthcare facilities are supported in using inventory systems, and engage with local stakeholders to strengthen the state’s supply chain network.


Responsibilities


	Coordinate and manage fleet operations and deliveries across project sites.
	Support healthcare facilities with onboarding and effective use of logistics and inventory systems.
	Liaise with relevant government and private sector stakeholders to enhance operational efficiency.
	Monitor and report on logistics performance indicators and fleet utilization.
	Ensure compliance with company logistics and reporting standards.
	Facilitate partnerships that enhance last-mile delivery and financial inclusion initiatives.


Requirements


	Qualification: B.Sc. / HND in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Business Administration, or related discipline.
	Experience: Minimum of 3 years in logistics, supply chain, or field operations (preferably in development, health, or FMCG sectors).
	Skills: Strong coordination and stakeholder management, fleet and route planning, data analysis, and use of digital tools.
	Attributes: Proactive, reliable, organized, tech-savvy, and able to work independently in the field.
	Must be based in or willing to relocate to Kaduna State.


Salary
N150,000 / Monthe (Gross).

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Applications to: team@lifebank.ng using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.
